verses.text: Co masanil kajan onh t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik, conh b'itanec t'a Jehová t'a tzalajk'olal.
Cak'equem ko b'a t'ay t'a tzalajk'olal. Cotanhec t'a yichanh yet' av yic tzalajk'olal.
Cham wal cojtakaneli to a Jehová Dios toni. A' ix onh b'oani, yuj chi' yiconh. Ha onh schonhab' onh tik, icha wal skalnel kaji.
Conh ochec t'a puerta yic tzonh och t'a yol yamaq'uil skajnub' yic skalec wach' lolonel t'ay. Caq'ek yuj diosal t'ay, skalanec wach' lolonel t'ay.
Yujto a Jehová wach' toni. Ha swach'k'olal aynhejek' t'a junelnhej, malaj b'aj max yak'elk'och tas syala'.
